name: SCARY CHIP (Downloaded version)
description:
The world has changed a lot in the last two centuries.

Today, October 12, 2492, little is left of the free

agency of the people.

Technology is at a subliminal level.

Every human being has a biological chip inserted,

implanted at the very moment of his conception, which

controls all aspects of life and being from him.

Sex ... race ... skills ... disease ...

life expectancy ... unstoppable stimuli ... etc.

The "ARMAGEDON" project controls the levels of

selective natality and mortality. The world population

it has been reduced by 80% in the last 50 years.

The "Armageddon" system controls the activity of

people, their dream, work and death.

... ... ... ...

... but something starts to fail ... the system starts

to be autonomous. There are guidelines that you have stopped

recognize and everything indicates that it can become the ...

EXTERMINATOR OF HUMANITY LIVE!
